column2: the pulled pork was the best.  I found the brisket a bit dry
column3: but pretty good (although no smoke ring).  Overall
column4: I was a bit disappointed in the lack of smoke flavor in the food.  I also felt that there could be more of a bite to their rubs.  However
column5: the sauce (especially the vinegar-based) made up for that.  The slaw rocked!
